errors.CSV_HEADERS_NOT_VALID: Le modèle a été altéré, merci de le télécharger à nouveau

creation.title: Pour créer des sessions ?
creation.list-with-candidates: Avec candidats, complétez le modèle dans son intégralité,
creation.list-without-candidates: Sans candidat, complétez uniquement les informations des sessions.

edition.title: Pour éditer la liste des candidats de sessions déjà créées ?
edition.replace: Pour remplacer une liste pré-existante dans le fichier modèle,
edition.subscription: Pour inscrire des candidats dans une session vide.
edition.warning: Attention à renseigner le numéro de session sans les autres informations de sessions (ex: date, heure, etc.) pour éviter les doublons lors de la création.

blocking-errors.title: {blockingErrorReportsCount} {blockingErrorReportsCount, plural,one {erreur bloquante} other {erreurs bloquantes}}
blocking-errors.information: Veuillez corriger toutes les erreurs bloquantes avant de re-importer le fichier .csv :

errors.CANDIDATE_BIRTH_INSEE_CODE_OR_BIRTH_POST: Renseigner soit un code INSEE, soit un code postal et un nom de commune de naissance
errors.CANDIDATE_BIRTH_CITY_REQUIRED: Champ obligatoire "Nom de la commune" manquant
errors.CANDIDATE_BIRTH_INFORMATION_REQUIRED: Renseigner les données de naissance du candidat
errors.CANDIDATE_BIRTH_POSTAL_CODE_CITY_NOT_VAL: Le code postal et le nom de la commune ne correspondent pas
errors.CANDIDATE_BIRTHDATE_FORMAT_NOT_VALID: Donnée du champ "Date de naissance" invalide (format accepté JJ/MM/AAAA)
errors.CANDIDATE_BIRTHDATE_MUST_BE_GREATER: Champ "Date de naissance" doit être supérieur à 01/01/1900
errors.CANDIDATE_EXTRA_TIME_BELOW_ONE: Donnée du champ "Temps majoré" invalide (exemple de format accepté: 30%)
errors.CANDIDATE_EXTRA_TIME_INTEGER: Donnée du champ "Temps majoré" invalide (exemple de format accepté: 30%)
errors.CANDIDATE_FOREIGN_INSEE_CODE_NOT_VALID: Candidat né à l'étranger, inscrire 99 dans le champ "Code INSEE"
errors.CANDIDATE_FOREIGN_BIRTH_CITY_REQUIRED: Candidat né à l'étranger, champ obligatoire "Nom de la commune" manquant
errors.CANDIDATE_FOREIGN_POSTAL_CODE_MUST_BE_EM: Candidat né à l'étranger, le champ "Code postal" doit rester vide
errors.CANDIDATE_MAX_ONE_COMPLEMENTARY_CERTIFIC: Inscription possible qu'à une seule certification complémentaire par candidat
errors.CANDIDATE_BILLING_MODE_NOT_VALID: Donnée du champ "Tarification part Pix" invalide (formats acceptés "Gratuite", "Payante" ou "Prépayée")
errors.CANDIDATE_PREPAYMENT_CODE_REQUIRED: Champ obligatoire "Code de prépaiement" manquant (doit être renseigné en cas de tarification part Pix prépayée)
errors.CANDIDATE_PREPAYMENT_CODE_MUST_BE_EMPTY: Champ "Code de prépaiement" doit rester vide (dans le cas de tarification part Pix gratuite ou payante)
errors.CANDIDATE_NOT_ALLOWED_FOR_STARTED_SESSIO: Édition des candidats impossible, le numéro de session correspond à une session déjà démarrée
errors.CANDIDATE_EMAIL_NOT_VALID: Donnée du champ "E-mail de convocation" invalide
errors.CANDIDATE_RESULT_RECIPIENT_EMAIL_NOT_VAL: Donnée du champ "E-mail du destinataire des résultats (formateur, enseignant…)" invalide
errors.SESSION_ROOM_REQUIRED: Champ obligatoire "Nom de la salle" manquant
errors.SESSION_DATE_NOT_VALID: Donnée du champ "Date de session" invalide (format accepté JJ/MM/AAAA)
errors.SESSION_TIME_NOT_VALID: Donnée du champ "Heure de début" invalide (format accepté HH:MM)
errors.SESSION_WITH_DATE_AND_TIME_ALREADY_EXIST: Une session a déjà été créée avec ces informations. Pour ajouter des candidats à une session, indiquer uniquement le numéro de session sans les informations de session
errors.SESSION_SCHEDULED_IN_THE_PAST: Date et/ou heure indiquées antérieures à la date du jour
errors.SESSION_ID_NOT_VALID: Donnée du champ "Numéro de session" invalide
errors.INFORMATION_NOT_ALLOWED_WITH_SESSION_ID: Numéro de session fourni, veuillez supprimer les informations de session associées

non-blocking-errors.title: {nonBlockingErrorReportsCount} {nonBlockingErrorReportsCount, plural,one {Point d’attention non bloquant} other {Points d’attention non bloquants}}
non-blocking-errors.information: Nous avons détecté {nonBlockingErrorReportsCount, plural,one {un point d’attention non bloquant} other {des points d’attention non bloquants}} lors de l’import, consultez-{nonBlockingErrorReportsCount, plural,one {le} other {les}} avant de procéder à la création ou l’édition de vos sessions :

errors.DUPLICATE_CANDIDATE_IN_SESSION: Le candidat inscrit plusieurs fois à la même session, une seule inscription sera prise en compte.
errors.EMPTY_SESSION: La session ne contient pas de candidat

delete-modal.title: Delete the session
delete-modal.content: Do you want to delete the session {sessionId} ?
delete-modal.enrolled-candidates: {enrolledCandidatesCount} {enrolledCandidatesCount, plural,one {candidate} other {candidates}} {enrolledCandidatesCount, plural,one {is} other {are}} enrolled in this session
delete-modal.success: The session has been successfully deleted.

add-modal.title: Enrol a candidate
add-modal.info-panel:
If this field isn’t filled in, the results won't be transmitted by email for the affected candidate(s).
The candidate will see their results displayed directly on their Pix account.
add-modal.prepayment-tooltip:
Required in particular when purchasing combined credits)
It must be comprised of the organisation’s SIRET and of the invoice’s number. Ex : 12345678912345/FACT12345.
If you don’t have an invoice, a prepayment code must be set with Pix.
add-modal.required-fields: The fields marked by * are required.

notifications.success-add: The candidate has been successfully enrolled.
notifications.success-remove: The candidate has been successfully deleted.Ï
notifications.error-add-duplicate: This candidate is already in the list, you can't add them again.
notifications.error-add-unknown: An error occurred while adding the candidate.
notifications.error-remove-already-in: This candidate has already joined the session, you can’t delete them.
notifications.error-remove-unknown: An error occurred while deleting the candidate.

list.title: Candidates' list

delete.tooltip: This candidate has already joined the session, you can’t delete them.

list.with-details-description: List of candidates enrolled in the session, ordered by birth name, with a link to see the candidate’s details and the possibility to delete a candidate in the last column.
list.without-details-description: List of candidates enrolled in the session, ordered by birth name, with the possibility to delete a candidate in the last column.

panel-actions.title: Enrol candidates

download.description:
To enrol candidates in the session, fill in their details (Last name, First name, …) in this document..
When you first download the template for the candidates' list, it will be blank. Afterwards, it will contain the details of the candidates enrolled in the session.
download.extra-information: Download the template for the candidates' list
download.label: Download (.ods)

upload.description:
Select the candidates' list previously filled in.
Warning, any new upload deletes the existing candidates' list.
upload.label: Upload (.ods)

panel-actions.warning:
The session has begun, you can’t upload a candidates' list anymore.
If you want to edit the list, you can enrol a candidate directly in the table below.

panel-clea.title: Des candidats ont obtenu le certificat CléA numérique
panel-clea.description: Pour générer les certificats CléA numérique, téléchargez la liste des candidats, complétez-la, enregistrez-la au format .xlsx puis importez-la sur la
panel-clea.error-message: Une erreur est survenue lors du téléchargement du fichier. Veuillez réessayer ou contacter certif@pix.fr en indiquant le numéro de la session concernée.

parameters.finalization-info: The finalisation information for the session has already been transmitted to Pix.

actions.cancel-extra-information: Cancel the session creation and return to the previous page

errors.SESSION_TIME_REQUIRED: Please indicate a starting time in local time.
errors.SESSION_EXAMINER_REQUIRED: Please indicate the last name and first name of the invigilator(s).

actions.cancel-extra-information: Cancel the session change and return to the previous page

actions.transmit-report: Please transmit the fraud report filled in during the certification session by using this form

category-labels.non-blocking-candidate-issue: Non-blocking incident linked to the candidate
category-labels.signature-issue: Was present but forgot to sign or signed on the wrong line

errors.add-reporting: An error occurred while adding a reporting. Please try again.

non-blocking-issues.candidate-examples: Left temporarily, under invigilation, the exam room, arrived late, encountered difficulties to connect to the session, had to reconnect to the session, had forgotten their password…
non-blocking-issues.candidate-information: Reporting on an indicative basis, the problem encountered didn’t prevent the candidate from continuing to answer the questions.
non-blocking-issues.technical-examples: The computer switched off, significant slowness of the network and/or of the machine etc…
non-blocking-issues.technical-information: Reporting on an indicative basis, the problem encountered didn’t prevent the candidate from continuing to answer the questions. In case of an incident during a focus mode question, please refer to the E10 category.

subcategory-labels.accessibility-issue: Problem with the accessibility of the question (ex : colour blindness)
subcategory-labels.extra-time-exceeded: The candidate profits from extra time and hasn’t been able to answer the question within the time allocated
subcategory-labels.file-not-opening: The file to download can’t be downloaded or doesn’t open
subcategory-labels.name-or-birthdate: Edit the first name/last name/date of birth
subcategory-labels.skip-on-oops: A technical problem due to the Pix platform prevented the candidate from answering the question
subcategory-labels.software-not-working: The software installed on the computer didn’t work
subcategory-labels.unintentional-focus-out: The candidate was forced to click outside the authorised frame for a focus mode question
subcategory-labels.website-blocked: The website is blocked by the establishment’s network restrictions (social media for ex.)
subcategory-labels.website-unavailable: The website to visit is unavailable/under maintenance/unreachable

errors.delete-reporting: An error has occurred while deleting the reporting. Please try again

completed-reports-information.extra-information: List of candidates who have finished their certification exam, ordered by birth name, with a link to add a reporting if needed

reporting.description: For the reporting to be taken into account, you must use the appropriate reporting category (examples : C1, C2, etc).

uncompleted-reports-information.description: These candidates haven’t finished their Pix certification exam or the invigilator has ended their exam
uncompleted-reports-information.extra-information: List of candidates who haven’t finished their certification exam, ordered by birth name, with a link to add a reporting if needed and a drop-down list enabling you to select the reason for abandonment

labels.abandonment: Abandonment : lack of time or early departure

abandonment.enough-time-description: The candidate didn’t have enough time to answer all the questions
abandonment.left-deliberately-description: The candidate left deliberately before the end of the exam

tooltip.technical-problem-description: The candidate encountered a technical problem that prevented him from finishing his exam

reporting.title: Reporting: Signal, for each candidate, the incidents inputted into the incident report

complementary-information.title: Additional information (optional)
complementary-information.description: You may indicate, if need be, the events that occurred during the session. It isn’t necessary to report any missing candidates.
complementary-information.incident: Despite an incident having occurred during the session, the candidates have been able to finish their Pix certification exam. Additional time has been granted to at least one of the candidates.

candidates-joining-issue.label: At least one candidate was present during the certification session but couldn’t join the session.
candidates-joining-issue.link: You may find here a document to help you solve this kind of connection problem for the following sessions (PDF, 131ko).

errors.mandatory-fields: The fields “Session number” and “Session password” are required.
errors.incorrect-data: The session number and/or the session password entered are incorrect.

header.information: Warning, make sure that all the candidates have finished their exam before exiting the invigilation. To resume the invigilation of this session, you will have to enter again it’s session number and it’s password.

candidate-list.indicate-candidates-attendance: Check off each candidate present in the room to allow them to start their Pix certification exam.
candidate-list.no-candidate: No candidate enrolled in this session

test-end-modal.description: Warning, this action triggers the end of their Pix certification exam and is irreversible.
test-end-modal.error: An error occurred, {firstName} {lastName}'s test could not be ended.

resume-test-modal.cancel-label: Cancel and close the confirmation window
resume-test-modal.description: If the candidate has closed their Pix Certification exam window (by mistake, or because of a technical problem) and is still present in the exam room, you can allow them to resume their test where they left it.
resume-test-modal.error: An error has occurred, {firstName} {lastName} couldn't be allowed to resume his/her Pix certification exam.
resume-test-modal.success: Success ! {firstName} {lastName} can resume his/her Pix certification exam.

session-supervising-error.description: To access this session, click on the "Invigilate a session" button and fill in the details of the session

team.title: Team
team.pix-referer-tooltip: Le référent Pix est le contact privilégié des équipes de Pix. Il est le responsable du bon déroulement des sessions de certification.

no-referer-section.title: Aucun référent Pix désigné
no-referer-section.description: Le référent Pix est le contact privilégié des équipes de Pix. Il est le responsable du bon déroulement des sessions de certification.

select-referer-modal.title: Sélection du référent Pix
select-referer-modal.label: Sélectionner un référent Pix
select-referer-modal.description:
Le Groupement d’intérêt public, sis 21-23 rue des Ardennes 75019 Paris PIX met en œuvre en tant que responsable de traitement un traitement de données à caractère personnel portant sur votre adresse email professionnel de référent Pix.
La finalité de ce traitement est la communication des informations nécessaires aux attributions du référent Pix au sein du centre de certification agréé. Le traitement de cette données repose sur l’exécution de la convention d’agrément de votre centre de certification.
Les données sont conservées pendant la durée de la convention d’agrément en vigueur entre le GIP Pix et le centre habilité auquel vous êtes rattaché.
Vous disposez de droits personnels, droits d'accès, de rectification et d’effacement des données, le droit de limitation ou d’opposition au traitement pour motif légitime et le droit d’introduire une réclamation auprès d’une autorité de contrôle ainsi que le droit de définir des directives relatives à la conservation, à l'effacement et à la communication de vos données à caractère personnel en cas de décès que vous pouvez exercer par courriel auprès de notre DPD en adressant votre demande à l’adresse électronique suivante : dpd@pix.fr .
Vous disposez de la possibilité d’introduire une réclamation auprès de Commission nationale Informatique et libertés « CNIL » à l’adresse suivante : 3 Place de Fontenoy – TSA 80715 – 75334 Paris Cedex 07.
